ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Barret}
“…finally…
…made it…”{PAUSE}“…never wanna see…
no more stairs the rest of my life…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Tifa}
“…huff…puff…
I'm beat…”{PAUSE}“But here we are.
We'd better get ready!”
